name: Sophie's Place (formerly Cleo's Closet)
description: Nonprofit organization providing clothing assistance and thrift store services to individuals and families in need. Offers affordable clothing and household items to help families maintain dignity and meet basic needs. Serves the London, Kentucky area with compassionate support.
source: Verified from Facebook page and multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Individuals and families in need of clothing assistance
cost_information: Low-cost or free clothing and household items
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-12-19. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/people/Sophies-Place/61577593670862/. Phone number (606) 594-7581 confirmed from Google search results and Facebook page. Hours of operation verified from Facebook page. Organization is a nonprofit providing clothing assistance. Located in London, Kentucky. Formerly known as Cleo's Closet. All information cross-referenced with Google search results for consistency. Organization serves the local community with clothing assistance and thrift store services.
